Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: GigE Vision device type.
Enumeration.Description: GigE Vision device type.

EnumEntry.Name: Transmitter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Transmitter
EnumEntry.Description: Transmitter

EnumEntry.Name: Receiver
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Receiver
EnumEntry.Description: Receiver

EnumEntry.Name: Transceiver
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Transceiver
EnumEntry.Description: Transceiver

EnumEntry.Name: Peripheral
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Peripheral
EnumEntry.Description: Peripheral

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the name of the device's vendor
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the name of the device's vendor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the model name of the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the model name of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device's firmware
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device's firmware.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.Description: Device`s serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTLType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Transport Layer type of the device
Enumeration.Description: Transport Layer type of the device

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVision
EnumEntry.ToolTip: GigE Vision.
EnumEntry.Description: GigE Vision.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Float.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Float.ToolTip: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device.
Float.Description: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device. This can be used to estimate if the physical connection(s) can sustain transfer of free-running images from the camera at its maximum speed.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by the strings of the device's bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by the strings of the device's bootstrap registers.

EnumEntry.Name: UTF8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device use UTF8 character set.
EnumEntry.Description: Device use UTF8 character set.

EnumEntry.Name: ASCII
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device use ASCII character set.
EnumEntry.Description: Device use ASCII character set.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Mainboard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the device's mainboard.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the device's mainboard.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C).
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Integer.Name: FanSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Change the fan speed.
Integer.Description: Change the fan speed.

Boolean.Name: DeviceRegistersIsBigEndian
Boolean.Description: Endianess of the registers of the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTLVersionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select the GigE Vision protocol version of the device. Needs reboot for application.
Enumeration.Description: Select the GigE Vision protocol version of the device. Needs reboot for application.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.
Enumeration.Description: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image compression is disabled. Images are transmitted uncompressed.
EnumEntry.Description: Image compression is disabled. Images are transmitted uncompressed.

EnumEntry.Name: JPEG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: JPEG compression is selected.
EnumEntry.Description: JPEG compression is selected.

Integer.Name: ImageCompressionQuality
Integer.ToolTip: Control the quality of the produced compressed stream.
Integer.Description: Control the quality of the produced compressed stream.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the darkest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the smallest value that each color component can take.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the brightest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the biggest value that each color component can take.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test image, witch is generated by the device, as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image, witch is generated by the device, as image source.

Enumeration.Name: Binning
Enumeration.ToolTip: Combine photo-sensitive cells together.
Enumeration.Description: Combine photo-sensitive cells together. This will reduces the resolution of the image.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No Binning in Vertical and Horizatal dirction .
EnumEntry.Description: No Binning in Vertical and Horizatal dirction .

EnumEntry.Name: X
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Only two of Horizatal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
EnumEntry.Description: Only two of Horizatal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.

EnumEntry.Name: Y
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Only two of Vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together .
EnumEntry.Description: Only two of Vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together .

EnumEntry.Name: XY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Two of Vertical and two of Horizatal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
EnumEntry.Description: Two of Vertical and two of Horizatal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.

Enumeration.Name: Decimation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sub-sampling of the image in read-1-skip-1 manner.
Enumeration.Description: Sub-sampling of the image in read-1-skip-1 manner. This reduces the resolution of the image by the specified decimation factor.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No Sub-sampling in Vertical and Horizatal dirction .
EnumEntry.Description: No Sub-sampling in Vertical and Horizatal dirction.

EnumEntry.Name: X
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Only Sub-sampling in Horizatal dirction.
EnumEntry.Description: Only Sub-sampling in Horizatal dirction.

EnumEntry.Name: Y
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Only Sub-sampling in Vertical dirction .
EnumEntry.Description: Only Sub-sampling in Vertical dirction .

EnumEntry.Name: XY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sub-sampling in Horizatal and Vertical dirction .
EnumEntry.Description: Sub-sampling in Horizatal and Vertical dirction .

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.
Boolean.Description: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger.

Boolean.Name: TriggerSoftwareSpeedUp
Boolean.ToolTip: Speed up software trigger.
Boolean.Description: Speed up software trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: This enumeration sets the signal transition needed to activate the selected trigger.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the signal transition needed to activate the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the width of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the width of the source signal.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Integer.Name: TriggerMultiplier
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies a multiplication factor for the incoming trigger pulses.
Integer.Description: Specifies a multiplication factor for the incoming trigger pulses.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.

Float.Name: ExposureTimeHigh
Float.ToolTip: ExposureTimeHigh.
Float.Description: ExposureTimeHigh.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Integer.Name: ExposureTimeRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Exposure Time
Integer.Description: Exposure Time (Address h0E)(0~0xfffe) 0:9us ; 1~0xfffe = Exposure Time*15.3us; 0xfffe:1s

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.

Integer.Name: ExposureTargetBrightness
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the target brightness for auto exposure function.
Integer.Description: Sets the target brightness for auto exposure function.

Enumeration.Name: HDRAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic HDR.
Enumeration.Description: Sets Off or Once for the HDR mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.

Integer.Name: HDRLevel
Integer.ToolTip: HDRLevel.
Integer.Description: HDRLevel.

Boolean.Name: AVGEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable of frames cumulation
Boolean.Description: Enable of frames cumulation

Integer.Name: AVGNum
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames cumulation.
Integer.Description: Number of frames cumulation.

Float.Name: ResultingFrameRateAbs
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed frame acquisition rate (in frames per second) given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth
Float.Description: Indicates the 'absolute' value of the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate. The 'absolute' value is a float value that indicates the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate in frames per second given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables setting the camera's acquisition frame rate to a specified value
Boolean.Description: Enables setting the camera's acquisition frame rate to a specified value

Float.Name: LightTriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Set the delay time from camera receiving trigger signal to Lightrigger signal starting to output (in us).
Float.Description: Set the delay time from camera receiving trigger signal to Lightrigger signal starting to output (in us).

Integer.Name: TriggerMultiplierMin
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: AcqTriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: FrameTriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: AcqTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: FrameTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: AcqTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: FrameTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: ToolTip
Enumeration.Description: Description

Float.Name: AcqTriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: ToolTip
Float.Description: Description

Float.Name: FrameTriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: ToolTip
Float.Description: Description

Integer.Name: AcqTriggerMultiplier
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: FrameTriggerMultiplier
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Category.Name: AutoFunctionControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that parameterize the Auto Functions
Category.Description: This category includes items that parameterize the Auto Functions

Integer.Name: AutoTargetBrightness
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the target average brightness for the gain auto function and the exposure auto function.
Integer.Description: This int value sets the target average brightness for the gain auto function and the exposure auto function.

Enumeration.Name: AutoFunctionProfile
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the strategy for controlling gain and shutter simultaneously.
Enumeration.Description: The auto function profile specifies whether the gain or the exposure time will be kept as low as possible when the camera is making automatic adjustments to achieve a target average gray value for the pixel data from the Auto Function AOI that was related to the gain auto and the exposure auto function. By default, the auto function profile feature minimizes gain.

EnumEntry.Name: Smart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Smart Profile.
EnumEntry.Description: Smart Profile.

Float.Name: AutoGainLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Sets the lower limit of the Gain parameter.
Float.Description: This float value sets the lower limit of the Gain parameter.

Float.Name: AutoGainUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Sets the upper limit of the Gain parameter.
Float.Description: This float value sets the upper limit of the Gain parameter.

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Sets the lower limit of the Exposure Time parameter.
Float.Description: This float value sets the lower limit of the Exposure Time parameter.

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Sets the upper limit of the Exposure Time parameter.
Float.Description: This float value sets the upper limit of the Exposure Time parameter.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMeterMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Exposure Meter Mode
Enumeration.Description: Exposure Meter Mode

Integer.Name: ExposureROILeft
Integer.ToolTip: Exposure ROI Left
Integer.Description: Exposure ROI Left

Integer.Name: ExposureROITop
Integer.ToolTip: Exposure ROI Top
Integer.Description: Exposure ROI Top

Integer.Name: ExposureROIRight
Integer.ToolTip: Exposure ROI Right
Integer.Description: Exposure ROI Right

Integer.Name: ExposureROIBottom
Integer.ToolTip: Exposure ROI Bottom
Integer.Description: Exposure ROI Bottom

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.

Integer.Name: LineSelectorVal
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.
Integer.Description: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a Frame start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a Frame start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer0Active
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timer0 is in active state.
EnumEntry.Description: Timer0 is in active state.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger to capture frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger to capture frames.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: LightTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger signal which triggers light source.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger signal which triggers light source.

Integer.Name: ExposureActiveAhead
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the preset time(us) of exposure active event occur.
Integer.Description: Returns the preset time(us) of exposure active event occur.

Enumeration.Name: LineFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.

EnumEntry.Name: OptoCoupled
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Line is opto-coupled.
EnumEntry.Description: The Line is opto-coupled.

EnumEntry.Name: TTL
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Line is currently accepting or sending TTL level signals.
EnumEntry.Description: The Line is currently accepting or sending TTL level signals.

Float.Name: LineDebouncerTimeAbs
Float.ToolTip: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds
Float.Description: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output state of UserOutput0, designated by UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: Output state of UserOutput0, designated by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output state of UserOutput1, designated by UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: Output state of UserOutput1, designated by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output state of UserOutput2, designated by UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: Output state of UserOutput2, designated by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output state of UserOutput3, designated by UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: Output state of UserOutput3, designated by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output state of UserOutput4, designated by UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: Output state of UserOutput4, designated by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output state of UserOutput5, designated by UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: Output state of UserOutput5, designated by UserOutputValue.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Integer.Name: UserOutputValueAll
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.
Integer.Description: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.

Category.Name: EventControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains Event control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains Event control features.

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.

Enumeration.Name: EventNotification
Enumeration.ToolTip: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.
Enumeration.Description: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Float.Name: GainRaw
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode. The exact algorithm used to implement AGC is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is User controlled using Gain.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is User controlled using Gain.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This enumeration selects the black level control to configure. Once a black level control has been selected, all changes to the black level settings will be applied to the selected control.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the black level control to configure. Once a black level control has been selected, all changes to the black level settings will be applied to the selected control.

Integer.Name: BlackLevel
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Integer.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Integer.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment. The exact algorithm used to implement this adjustment is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog black level is user controlled using BlackLevel.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog black level is user controlled using BlackLevel.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog black level is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog black level is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog black level is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog black level is constantly adjusted by the device.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Balance ratio to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Balance ratio to control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is user controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is user controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: hite balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for non-linearity of the display system (such as CRT).

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to control the operation of the camera's lookup table (LUT)
Category.Description: This category includes items used to control the operation of the camera's lookup table (LUT)

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which LUT to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which LUT to control.

EnumEntry.Name: Luminance
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Luminace LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Luminace LUT.

Boolean.Name: LUTEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected LUT.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.

Register.Name: LUTValueAll
Register.ToolTip: Accesses all the LUT coefficients in a single access without using individual LUTIndex.
Register.Description: Accesses all the LUT coefficients in a single access without using individual LUTIndex.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Transport Layer control features.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Integer.Name: GevActiveLinkCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current number of active logical links.
Integer.Description: Indicates the current number of active logical links.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which logical link to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which logical link to control.

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the logical link.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the logical link.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.DisplayName: GEV Current IP Configuration Persistent IP

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given locical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given locical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given logical link.

Enumeration.Name: GevIPConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the current IP configuration status.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the current IP configuration status.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file. The First URL is used as the first choice by the application to retrieve the GenICam XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file. This URL is an alternative if the application was unsuccessful to retrieve the device description file using the first URL.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of logical links supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of logical links supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent IP address for this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent IP address for this logical link. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this logical link.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the persistent default gateway for this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the persistent default gateway for this logical link. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz). If IEEE 1588 is used, this feature must return 1,000,000,000 (1 GHz).

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlReset
Command.Description: Resets the timestamp counter to 0. This feature is not available or as no effect when IEEE 1588 is used.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Enumeration.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodesSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for.
Enumeration.DisplayName: GEV GVCP Extended Status Codes Selector

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodes
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of extended status codes.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of extended status codes.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPPendingAck
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPHeartbeatDisable
Boolean.ToolTip: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.
Boolean.Description: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.

Integer.Name: GevGVCPPendingTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the longest GVCP command execution time (ms) before a device returns a PENDING_ACK.
Integer.Description: Indicates the longest GVCP command execution time (ms) before a device returns a PENDING_ACK.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSwitchoverKey
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.
Integer.Description: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.
Integer.DisplayName: GEV GVCP Primary Application Switchover Key

Enumeration.Name: GevGVSPExtendedIDMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables the extended IDs mode.
Enumeration.Description: Enables the extended IDs mode.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSocket
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the address of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of the logical link to use.
Integer.Description: Index of the logical link to use.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevSCPDSwitch
Enumeration.ToolTip: switch internal SCPD or custom SCPD.
Enumeration.Description: switch internal SCPD or custom SCPD. recommend user using jumbo frames.
Enumeration.DisplayName: switch internal SCPD or custom SCPD.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: using internal SCPD.
EnumEntry.Description: using internal SCPD.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Using custom SCPD.
EnumEntry.Description: Using custom SCPD.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

Category.Name: GigEVision
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the features pertaining to the GigE Vision transport layer of the device.
Category.Description: Category that contains the features pertaining to the GigE Vision transport layer of the device.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of the device registers.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of the device registers.
Boolean.DisplayName: GEV Device Mode Is Big Endian

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceClass
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the class of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the class of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Enumeration.Name: GevPhysicalLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the principal physical link configuration to use on next restart/power-up of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the principal physical link configuration to use on next restart/power-up of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevCurrentPhysicalLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the current physical link configuration of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the current physical link configuration of the device.

Boolean.Name: GevPAUSEFrameReception
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether incoming PAUSE Frames are handled on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether incoming PAUSE Frames are handled on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevPAUSEFrameTransmission
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether PAUSE Frames can be generated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether PAUSE Frames can be generated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevIEEE1588
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol to control the timestamp register.
Boolean.Description: Enables the IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol to control the timestamp register.

Enumeration.Name: GevIEEE1588ClockAccuracy
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.

Enumeration.Name: GevIEEE1588Status
Enumeration.ToolTip: Provides the state of the IEEE 1588 clock.
Enumeration.Description: Provides the state of the IEEE 1588 clock.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGUnconditionalStreaming
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGExtendedChunkData
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.
Boolean.Description: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.

Enumeration.Name: GevSCPDirection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the direction of the stream channel.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the direction of the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetLoadLastUserSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the last user set executed by the device from a user set load command, or as a result of a device reset.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the last user set executed by the device from a user set load command, or as a result of a device reset.
Enumeration.DisplayName: User Set Load Last User Set

Enumeration.Name: UserSetLoadStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the status of the last user set load executed by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the status of the last user set load executed by the device.

Integer.Name: UserSet1Valid
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: UserSet2Valid
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.
Boolean.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Chunk to enable or control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Chunk to enable or control.

Boolean.Name: ChunkEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.
Boolean.Description: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Integer.Name: ChunkCounter0Value
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the value of PLC Counter 0.
Integer.Description: Returns the value of PLC Counter 0.

Integer.Name: ChunkCounter1Value
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the value of PLC Counter 1.
Integer.Description: Returns the value of PLC Counter 1.

Category.Name: ColorTransformationControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Color Transformation control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Color Transformation control features.

Enumeration.Name: ColorTransformationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Color Transformation module is controlled by the various Color Transformation features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Color Transformation module is controlled by the various Color Transformation features.

EnumEntry.Name: RGBtoRGB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: RGB to RGB color transformation.
EnumEntry.Description: RGB to RGB color transformation.

EnumEntry.Name: RGBtoYUV
EnumEntry.ToolTip: RGB to YUV color transformation.
EnumEntry.Description: RGB to YUV color transformation.

Boolean.Name: ColorTransformationEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected Color Transformation module.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected Color Transformation module.

Enumeration.Name: ColorTransformationValueSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Gain factor or Offset of the Transformation matrix to access in the selected Color Transformation module.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Gain factor or Offset of the Transformation matrix to access in the selected Color Transformation module.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain00
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 0,0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 0,0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain01
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 0,1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 0,1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain02
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 0,2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 0,2 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 1,0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 1,0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain11
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 1,1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 1,1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 1,2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 1,2 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain20
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 2,0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 2,0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain21
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 2,1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 2,1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain22
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 2,2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 2,2 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Offset0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offset 0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Offset 0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Offset1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offset 1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Offset 1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Offset2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offset 2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Offset 2 of the transformation matrix.

Float.Name: ColorTransformationValue
Float.ToolTip: Represents the value of the selected Gain factor or Offset inside the Transformation matrix.
Float.Description: Represents the value of the selected Gain factor or Offset inside the Transformation matrix.

Category.Name: CounterAndTimerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.

Enumeration.Name: CounterSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Counter to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Counter to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the counter 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the counter 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the counter 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the counter 1.

Enumeration.Name: TimerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Timer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Timer to configure.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer.

Enumeration.Name: CounterResetSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the Counter Reset trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the Counter Reset trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: SoftwareSignal0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets on the reception of the Software Signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets on the reception of the Software Signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts when the specified CounterTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.

Enumeration.Name: CounterEventSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Select the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame Start Trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame Start Trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame Start.

Command.Name: CounterReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it.

Integer.Name: TimerDelay
Integer.ToolTip: It sets the duration in device-specific unit of the delay to apply after the reception of a trigger before to start the Timer.
Integer.Description: It sets the duration in device-specific unit of the delay to apply after the reception of a trigger before to start the Timer.

Integer.Name: TimerDuration
Integer.ToolTip: It sets the duration in device-specific unit of the Timer pulse.
Integer.Description: It sets the duration in device-specific unit of the Timer pulse. high pluse = duration/32552(s)
